parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Item at which to get the Distance 2radius

title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.GetDistance
description: Gets the Distance 2 radius at the specified item of this asymmetric fillet/chamfer.

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Item at which to get the Distance 2radius

returns: Distance 2 radius at PFilletItem for this asymmetric fillet/chamfer
remarks:
Call
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::GetRadius
to get the Distance 1 radius at PFilletItem for this asymmetric fillet/chamfer.
